metadata.synopsis: Dialog with one of the guards in the Flaming Fist Office
metadata.how_to_trigger: Click on Fist Colman Callaway - S_WYR_WyrmRock_FFOfficeGuard_003 b7f14bc2-5fa5-4072-9cd4-7fa9ad673dc0 - (-24; 44; 206)

0.speaker: Fist Callaway
0.text: The Flaming Fist don't stand for trouble. So stay out of it, yeah?
0.context: NodeContext: delivered like a gentle warning from a neighbourhood policeman
